text: Kheun Arab gampong kamoe meuiman Gohlom taiman meunan tapeugah Takheun dum mantong kamoe Iseulam Teuma meuiman ate goh teuhah Gohłom jitamong iman lam ate Beu that tapike tapubuet sudah Meunyo tataʻat gata keu Tuhan Ngon rasul Tuhan pih hana ubah Han sagai kureueng dum amai gata Allah Taʻala Pengampon leupah Geumaseh pih that Allah Taʻala
